inclusion.criterion: ≤ completed gestational week 10 after ART with the present partner or with an egg/semen donor
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: ≥2 previous pregnancies with fetuses with known abnormal karyotype
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 41-year-old obese woman coming to the emergency room with abdominal pain and vomiting. She has no history of allergies and uses only multivitamins daily.
